title: Authors
text: Christopher Gandrud. Maintainer.

what: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: Started Christopher Gandrud R package includes functions gathering commonly used regularly maintained political science data sets. also includes functions combining components data sets variables suggested political science literature, regularly updated. psData includes two primary function types: Getters Variable Builders. Getter functions automate gathering cleaning particular data sets can easily merged data. transform underlying data. Variable Builders use Getters gather data transform new variables suggested political science literature. functions currently part psData include:

title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: DpiGet: function download Database Political Institutions data set. keeps specified variables creates standard country ID variable can used merging data data sets. PolityGet: function download Polity IV data set. keeps specified variables creates standard country ID variable can used merging data data sets. RRCrisisGet: download combine Reinhart Rogoff’s (2010) crisis dummy variables one data frame. WB_IMFGet downloads Axel Dreher’s data set IMF programs World Bank projects (1970-2011). keeps specified variables creates standard country ID variable can used merging data data sets.

title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: WinsetCreator: Creates winset (W) modified version selectorate (S) variable Bueno de Mesquita et al. (2003) using recent data available Polity IV Database Political Institutions.

title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: functions included might useful people working political science data: CountryID: Function creating standardised country names ID variables. builds countrycode includes extra capabilities reporting dealing duplicates.

title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: Getter functions currently included psData download data specific URL links data file. Hopefully, data sets’ authors keep data --date. make updates, likely link updated file new URL. functions psData gather data file specific URL allow user specify new URL, want . notice updated version one data sets, feel free submit Pull Request new URL. great make sure function still works, data set’s authors may change format breaking Getter function.

title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: Please feel free suggest data set downloading variable creating functions. just leave note package’s Issues page. Also feel free make pull request new Getter Variable Builder. Please make pull request branch master.

title: Download Regularly Maintained Political Science Data Sets
text: download polity2 variable Polity IV: Note iso2c variable refers ISO two letter country code country ID. standardised country identifier used easily merge Polity IV data another data set. Another country ID can selected OutCountryID argument. See package documentation details. create winset (W) selectorate (ModS) data use following code:
code: library(psData) PolityData <- PolityGet(vars = "polity2")  head(PolityData) #>   iso2c standardized_country     country year polity2 #> 1    AF          Afghanistan Afghanistan 1800      -6 #> 2    AF          Afghanistan Afghanistan 1801      -6 #> 3    AF          Afghanistan Afghanistan 1802      -6 #> 4    AF          Afghanistan Afghanistan 1803      -6 #> 5    AF          Afghanistan Afghanistan 1804      -6 #> 6    AF          Afghanistan Afghanistan 1805      -6 library(psData)  WinData <- WinsetCreator()  head(WinData) #>   iso2c              country year    W ModS #> 1    AE United Arab Emirates 1975 0.25 0.25 #> 2    AE United Arab Emirates 1976 0.25 0.25 #> 3    AE United Arab Emirates 1977 0.25 0.25 #> 4    AE United Arab Emirates 1978 0.25 0.25 #> 5    AE United Arab Emirates 1979 0.25 0.25 #> 6    AE United Arab Emirates 1980 0.25 0.25

what: Function for creating standardised country names and ID variables — CountryID
title: Function for creating standardised country names and ID variables — CountryID
text: Function creating standardised country names ID variables based capabilities countrycode package. function also reports duplicated country IDs created lets user either drop return duplicated values inspection.

title: Function for creating standardised country names and ID variables — CountryID
code: CountryID(   data,   countryVar = "country",   OutCountryID = "iso2c",   standardCountryName = TRUE,   duplicates = "message",   timeVar = NULL,   fromLast = FALSE )

title: Function for creating standardised country names and ID variables — CountryID
text: data data frame object countryVar character string naming country.name variable. See countrycode. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. standardCountryName logical. Whether standardise country names variable based country.name  countrycode. duplicates character string specifying handle duplicated country country-time observations (latter see timeVar). Can set none nothing, message simply report duplicates, drop report drop duplicates, return return data frame duplicated observations (see also fromLast). timeVar character string indicating name time variable. example, country time series often separate rows based year variable. used solely determine duplicated country-time values. fromLast logical indicating duplication considered reverse side. relevant duplicates = 'drop' duplicates = 'return'.

what: Downloads the Democracy and Dictatorship data set — DDGet
title: Downloads the Democracy and Dictatorship data set — DDGet
text: Downloads Democracy Dictatorship data set. keeps specified variables creates standard country ID variable can used merging data data sets. See codebook authors' website https://sites.google.com/site/joseantoniocheibub/datasets/dd?authuser=0

title: Downloads the Democracy and Dictatorship data set — DDGet
code: DDGet(   url = "http://uofi.box.com/shared/static/bba3968d7c3397c024ec.dta",   vars = NULL,   OutCountryID = "iso2c",   standardCountryName = TRUE,   na.rm = TRUE,   duplicates = "message",   fromLast = FALSE )

title: Downloads the Democracy and Dictatorship data set — DDGet
text: url character string. URL Democracy Dictatorship data set like download. Note: must Stata version file. vars character vector containing variables keep. vars = NULL entire data set returned. Note country year variables always returned. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. standardCountryName logical. Whether standardise country names variable based country.name  countrycode. na.rm logical. Drop observations OutCountryID NA. duplicates character specifying handle duplicated country-year observations. Can set none nothing, message simply report duplicates, drop report drop duplicates, return return data frame duplicated observations (see also fromLast). fromLast logical indicating duplication considered reverse side. relevant duplicates = 'drop' duplicates = ''.

title: Downloads the Democracy and Dictatorship data set — DDGet
text: data frame

title: Downloads the Database of Political Institutions (DPI) — DpiGet
text: url character string. URL Polity IV data set like download. Note exclusively download previous, IMF hosted, versions data set. value supplied, 2015 IDB hosted version downloaded. link supplied must Stata formated file. vars character vector containing variables keep. vars = NULL entire data set returned. Note country year variables always returned. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. standardCountryName logical. Whether standardise country names variable based country.name  countrycode. na.rm logical. Drop observations OutCountryID NA. duplicates character specifying handle duplicated country-year observations. Can set none nothing, message simply report duplicates, drop report drop duplicates, return return data frame duplicated observations (see also fromLast). fromLast logical indicating duplication considered reverse side. relevant duplicates = 'drop' duplicates = ''.

what:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
title:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
text: Downloads Dreher's data set IMF programs World Bank projects (1970-2011). keeps specified variables creates standard country ID variable can used merging data data sets.

title:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
code: IMF_WBGet(   url = "http://axel-dreher.de/Dreher%20IMF%20and%20WB.xls",   sheets = c("WB other agreed", "WB environment agreed"),   OutCountryID = "iso2c",   message = TRUE,   standardCountryName = TRUE )

title:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
text: Data website: http://www.uni-heidelberg.de/fakultaeten/wiso/awi/professuren/intwipol/datasets_en.html. using IMF data, please cite: Dreher, Axel, 2006, IMF Economic Growth: Effects Programs, Loans, Compliance Conditionality, World Development 34, 5: 769-788. using World Bank data, please cite: Boockmann, Bernhard Axel Dreher, 2003, Contribution IMF World Bank Economic Freedom, European Journal Political Economy 19, 3: 633-649.

title:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
text: url character string. URL Dreher data set like download. Note: must xlx version file. Currently 1970-2011 version supported. sheets character vector Excel sheets (variables) like return. See Details information. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. message logical. Whether notify sheets cleaned organised. standardCountryName logical. Whether standardise country names variable based country.name  countrycode.

title:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
text: data frame

title:
Downloads Dreher's data set of IMF programs and World Bank projects
(1970-2011) — IMF_WBGet
text: Using sheets argument can select variables download individual workbook seets original data set. include: WB agreed: Number World Bank projects agreed, technical adjustment. WB technical agreed: Number World Bank technical projects agreed. WB adjustment agreed: Number World Bank adjustment projects agreed. WB environment agreed: Number World Bank environmental projects agreed. WB adjustment 5: Number World Bank adjustment projects effect least 5 months particular year. IMF SBA: IMF Standby Arrangement agreed, dummy. IMF EFF: IMF Extended Fund Facility Arrangement agreed, dummy. IMF SAF: IMF Structural Adjustment Facility Arrangement agreed, dummy. IMF PRGF: IMF Poverty Reduction Growth Facility Arrangement agreed, dummy. IMF SBA 5: IMF Standby Arrangement effect least 5 months particular year, dummy. IMF EFF 5: IMF Extended Fund Facility Arrangement effect least 5 months particular year, dummy. IMF SAF 5: IMF Structural Adjustment Facility Arrangement effect least 5 months particular year, dummy. IMF PRGF 5: IMF Poverty Reduction Growth Facility Arrangement effect least 5 months particular year, dummy.

title: Downloads Polity IV — PolityGet
text: Downloads Polity IV data set. keeps specified variables creates standard country ID variable can used merging data data sets.

title: Downloads Polity IV — PolityGet
code: PolityGet(   url = "http://www.systemicpeace.org/inscr/p4v2015.sav",   vars = NULL,   OutCountryID = "iso2c",   standardCountryName = TRUE,   na.rm = TRUE,   duplicates = "message",   fromLast = FALSE )

title: Downloads Polity IV — PolityGet
text: url character string. URL Polity IV data set like download. Note: must SPSS version file. vars character vector containing variables keep. vars = NULL entire data set returned. Note country year variables always returned. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. standardCountryName logical. Whether standardise country names variable based country.name  countrycode. na.rm logical. Drop observations OutCountryID NA. duplicates character specifying handle duplicated country-year observations. Can set none nothing, message simply report duplicates, drop report drop duplicates, return return data frame duplicated observations (see also fromLast). fromLast logical indicating duplication considered reverse side. relevant duplicates = 'drop' duplicates = ''.

title: Downloads Polity IV — PolityGet

title:
Download and combine Reinhart and Rogoff's (2010) crisis dummy variables into
one data frame — RRCrisisGet
text: Download combine Reinhart Rogoff's (2010) crisis dummy variables one data frame

title:
Download and combine Reinhart and Rogoff's (2010) crisis dummy variables into
one data frame — RRCrisisGet
code: RRCrisisGet(   urls = c("http://www.carmenreinhart.com/user_uploads/data/22_data.xls",     "http://www.carmenreinhart.com/user_uploads/data/35_data.xls",     "http://www.carmenreinhart.com/user_uploads/data/23_data.xls",     "http://www.carmenreinhart.com/user_uploads/data/25_data.xls"),   OutCountryID = "iso2c",   message = TRUE,   standardCountryName = TRUE )

title:
Download and combine Reinhart and Rogoff's (2010) crisis dummy variables into
one data frame — RRCrisisGet
text: Reinhart, Camen M. Kenneth S. Rogoff, ''Financial Crash Debt Crisis,'' NBER Working Paper 15795, March 2010. Forthcoming American Economic Review.

title:
Download and combine Reinhart and Rogoff's (2010) crisis dummy variables into
one data frame — RRCrisisGet
text: urls URLs Excel file Reinhart Rogoff data set. See https://carmenreinhart.com/browse--topic/. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. message logical. Whether notify sheets cleaned organised. standardCountryName logical. Whether standardise country names variable based country.name  countrycode.

title:
Download and combine Reinhart and Rogoff's (2010) crisis dummy variables into
one data frame — RRCrisisGet
text: Returns data frame following columns: iso2c: ISO two letter country code identifying country. can changed another country ID system using OutCountryID country: Country names. year: year. RR_Independence: Year independence. RR_CurrencyCrisis: Currency crisis. RR_InflationCrisis: Inflation crisis. RR_StockMarketCrash: Stock market crash. RR_SovDebtCrisisDom: Domestic sovereign debt crisis. RR_SovDebtCrisisExt: External sovereign debt crisis. RR_BankingCrisis: Banking crisis. RR_YearlyCrisisTally: Total number crises per year.

what: Create Winset and Selectorate variables — WinsetCreator
title: Create Winset and Selectorate variables — WinsetCreator
text: Creates winset (W) modified version selectorate (S) variable Bueno de Mesquita et al. (2003) using recent data available Polity IV Database Political Institutions.

title: Create Winset and Selectorate variables — WinsetCreator
code: WinsetCreator(   PolityUrl = "http://www.systemicpeace.org/inscr/p4v2015.sav",   DpiUrl = NULL,   OutCountryID = "iso2c",   na.rm = TRUE )

title: Create Winset and Selectorate variables — WinsetCreator
text: See Bueno de Mesquita Bruce, Alastair Smith, Randolph M. Siverson, James D. Morrow. 2003. Logic Political Survival. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press. Morrow, J. D., Bueno De Mesquita, B., Siverson, R. M., Smith, . 2008. Retesting Selectorate Theory: Separating Effects W Elements Democracy. American Political Science Review, 102(03), 393-400. Polity IV: http://www.systemicpeace.org/. Modified military regime take Database Political Institutions (https://publications.iadb.org/en/database-political-institutions-2020-dpi2020), rather Banks, Arthur S. 1996. Political Handbook World. New York: CSA Publications.

title: Create Winset and Selectorate variables — WinsetCreator
text: PolityUrl character string. URL Polity IV data set like download. Note: must SPSS version file. DpiUrl character string. URL Database Political Institutions data set like download. Note: link must Stata formated file. OutCountryID character string. type country ID like include output file along country name. See countrycode available options. na.rm logical. Drop observations OutCountryID NA.

title: Create Winset and Selectorate variables — WinsetCreator
text: Returns data frame following columns: iso2c: ISO two letter country code identifying country. can changed another country ID system using OutCountryID country: Country names. year: year. W: winset variable. variable Bueno de Mesquita (2003) except military executive component DPI, rather Banks (1996). ModS: modified selectorate variable. Instead based Polity LEGSELEC, longer create, ModS based Legislative Index Electoral Competetiveness variable (LIEC) DPI. legislature = 1. Unelected legislature = 2. Elected legislature 1 candidate = 3. Elected legislatures 1 party multiple candidates = 4. legislatures = 5. variable standardised 0 1 subtracting 1 dividing 4. Note: countries coded LIEC 3.5, ModS 6 levels 0 1.

what: Country code translation data frame. This data set and the following documentation is take from Vincent Arel-Bundock countrycode package version 0.17 with modifications. — countrycode_data
title: Country code translation data frame. This data set and the following documentation is take from Vincent Arel-Bundock countrycode package version 0.17 with modifications. — countrycode_data
text: data frame 262 observations following 14 variables. Used internally countrycode() function.

title: Country code translation data frame. This data set and the following documentation is take from Vincent Arel-Bundock countrycode package version 0.17 with modifications. — countrycode_data
Country code translation data frame. This data set and the following documentation is take from Vincent Arel-Bundock countrycode package version 0.17 with modifications. — countrycode_data
text: data frame 260 rows 11 columns

title: Country code translation data frame. This data set and the following documentation is take from Vincent Arel-Bundock countrycode package version 0.17 with modifications. — countrycode_data
text: country.name: Long country name cowc: Correlates War character cown: Correlates War numeric fao: Food Agriculture Organization United Nations numerical code fips104: FIPS 10-4 (Federal Information Processing Standard) imf: International Monetary Fund iso2c: ISO-2 character iso3c: ISO-3 character iso2n: ISO-2 numeric iso3n: ISO-3 numeric un: United Nations numerical code wb: World Bank (similar identical iso3c) regex: Regular expression used convert long names code region: Regions defined World Bank Development Indicators continent: Continent defined World Bank Development Indicators

title: Country code translation data frame. This data set and the following documentation is take from Vincent Arel-Bundock countrycode package version 0.17 with modifications. — countrycode_data
text: produce consistent conversion, entries removed      conversion data frame. example, Correlates War include 4 different      codes represent Western Germany. "countrycode" uses one (CoW      code 260 years). Similar choices made cases Korea,      Yemen, Congo Vietnam. Also, Namibia's iso2c code ("NA") can understood      missing observation (NA) R. Capitalized country names refer official short English names, defined      ISO organization. ISO publish official short English names      countries whose name capitalized country.name vector. Continent      region information taken UN website. (possibly incomplete) list countries codes dropped: KOREA, REPUBLIC : cown 731 730, cowc PRK KOR     YEMEN: cown 680 678, cowc YAR YPR     GERMANY: cown 267 260 245, cowc BAV GFR BAD     CONGO: cown 490, cowc 484     VIET NAM: cown 816, cowc DRV

title: psData (development version)
text: Update broken API links. Use readxl instead xlsx avoid dependency rJava.

title: psData 0.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2016-09-03 Remove inactive vignettes. Dynamic documentation README.

title: psData 0.2.1
text: Updated URL PolityGet 2015 version. Thanks Xavier Fernández Marín.

title: psData 0.1.6
text: informative drop message converting country IDs. Thank Anh Le.

title: psData 0.1.5
text: number getters now rely import rio. Download Democracy Dictatorship data set DDGet. Thank Anh Le.

title: psData 0.1.4
text: CountryID distinguishes Cyprus Turkish Cyprus

title: psData 0.1.3
text: Added IMF_WBGet download Axel Dreher’s data set IMF programs World Bank projects (1970-2011). Improved message control RRCrisisGet. Minor documentation improvements.

title: psData 0.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2014-02-23 Added RRCrisisGet gathering cleaning Reinhart Rogoff (2010) financial crisis dummy variables.

title: psData 0.1.1
text: Added ability report inspect duplicated values created standardising country names CountryID, PolityGet, DpiGet. Also added choice variables whether standardise country names along IDs.

title: psData 0.1
text: First development version psData. package includes following main functions: DpiGet PolityGet Wincreator
